messages.subject: C'mon baby light my fire
messages.msgSnippet: In case anyone s interested, it is absolutely impossible to break through frozen Utah soil in February. At least it is in the mountains where I live. We tried
messages.messageBody:
In case anyone's interested, it is absolutely impossible to break through
frozen Utah soil in February. At least it is in the mountains where I live.
We tried many different methods with no success. :-/ Trust me when I tell
you that it is cold here and has been for what seems like forever.

So...our dear little Tiny was cremated last night in a peaceful funeral pyre
by the waterfall. We are all looking forward to seeing how his ashes have
nourished the bulbs and wildflowers.

As part of her grieving process (apparently) Casey purchased a Teddy Bear
Hamster yesterday whom she has named Cookie. The King is dead, long live the
Queen. ;-)

~Mary
